caption.title: Measures of fire on the landscape.
caption.p: (A) Natural and human-affected areas as determined by reclassifying LandFire vegetation classes; (B) MTBS fire perimeters for 1985–2015; (C) Total NHA (non-human affected) area burned over 1985–2015 (sum of FAB weighted by grid cells’ NHA fraction over 1985–2015) for FF-WCE (full fire, with CO 2 fertilization effect); and (D) Total NHA area burned over 1985–2015 for SF-WCE (no fire suppression, with CO 2 fertilization effect).
